markdownRemark.html:
Creative, ambitious, and professional software engineer.

mr.nguyenth86@gmail.com

Skills

  • JavaScript, React, React Native
  • Node.js, Python, Java
  • MongoDB, MySQL, Oracle
  • Message Broker, Socket, Firebase, GraphQL
  • Web Performance Optimization
  • Fundamentals of Machine Learning: Bayesian & Deep Learn
  • UX-Design
  • Mentoring, Agile Methodology

Work

Technical Leader at NetLoading, April 2018 to now

Build Logistic system to track, analyze and improve local delivery operations in Vietnam. This help to build the connection between commodity owner, truck owner and shipper. The system was also built for the B2B market where production and consumption units use logistic services.

  • Develop Crawler module to collect and extract order data which was posted on facebook groups and other sources. This module is run concurrently on 5 Raspberry Pi and NUC devices.
  • Develop React Native, native Android applications and rollout them on App Store and Google Play.
  • Storage and query real-time data using Firebase
  • Build two-way communication between server and client using Socket.IO
  • Develop CMS, Admin Web pages using Gatsby and React.js
  • Build Auto Post Approval module by installing Information Extraction and Bayesian classifier algorithms on Python microservice.
  • Build B2B Admin Webapp using Python Django and React.js

Result:

  • Improve experience in building cross platform with React and React Native
  • Improve experience in building ML module
  • Have experience in building a startup and technology stacks support for this.

Senior Software Developer at WIMO.EA, July 2017 – April 2018

Build WIMO Logistic system to track, analyze and improve local delivery operations in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The system was built for the B2B market where production and consumption units use logistic services.

  • Develop Back-end microservice using Node.js ES5, MySQL Sequelize, Redis, PubNub service to tracking Driver location, AWS EC2
  • Develop SocketPubSub microservice using Node.js ES8, RabbitMQ, Socket.io
  • Develop Payment microservice to support PayPal, VISA, and MasterCard payments using Node.js ES8, MySQL Sequelize, Telr payment platform.
  • Develop PushNotification function on a microservice using Node.js ES8, Firebase
  • Support another project: Maintain Vending Ecosystem includes IoT vending machines & automated lockers for the F&B and retail industries in Singapore

Result:

  • The startup raised funding successfully
  • Improve experience in working at Full-Stack level
  • Have experience in Startup environments
  • Improve experience in integrating international payment methods
  • Improve experience in developing IoT system and mobile applications

Senior Software Developer at Dasan Zhone Solutions, July 2016 – February 2018

Build systems support business for the company.

  • Develop high-load system with Frontend using: Angular 1&4, React and Backend using: Java (jHipster, Liferay, Spring), Node.js, MongoDB, Redis, RabbitMQ
  • The systems often include OLT servers, each of which manages many ONT network devices such as Modem, Switch, Router. So I often face the issues to develop modules to work on restricted-resource hardware, including OpenWRT, Embedded Linux. And because of the project environment is network devices so regularly I work with different network protocols such as TR-069 (GenieACS), SNMP.
  • Investigate new technologies such as Malicious traffic detection system (Maltrail), TensorFlow DeepLeaning, ReactNative, GraphQL, Spring WebFlux, Docker
  • Build system analysis & design docs and other project documents using UML

Result:

  • Have experience in developing software for OLT and ONT devices
  • Worked as a Scrum Master on two projects
  • Have 4 years’ experience working at senior, technical leader level
  • Have more than 8 years’ professional experience
  • Get the depth of expertise, as well as soft skills

Development Leader; Senior Software Developer at Synergix Technologies, May 2015 – July 2016

Build Taskhub ERP product

  • Develop distributed system using Java (Network Data Transformation, Parallel, Concurrent programming skill, Load balancing)
  • Develop Java web applications using JSF 1.2, 2.2, Liferay, Spring Ecosystem
  • Develop TaskHub product modules include SCM (Supply Chain Management), MFG - Manufacturing modules: Inventory, Payment Logistics, Allocation, Purchase, Sales, BOM; HR module; Payroll module: Leave, Payslip, Timesheet; Projects.
  • Deploy, maintain applications on Linux and Windows Server
  • Build system analysis & design documents using UML
  • Investigate Frontend, Backend frameworks, including: Node.js, Angular, jHipster
  • Join training courses: Technical Skill, Task management, Teamwork

Result:

  • Have experience in developing ERP products
  • Completed 3 big customized versions for new Singapore customers
  • Have 3 years’ experience working at senior, technical leader level

Senior Software Developer at Electronics Communications Technology Investment Development Corporation, June 2010 – May 2015

Build IT systems for military and telecommunication customers

  • Develop distributed system using Java (Network Data Transformation, Parallel, Concurrent programming skill, Load balancing)
  • Develop and administer ORACLE Database systems
  • Research and develop some core frameworks and Big Data technologies
  • Develop Java portal, web applications using Liferay, Struts, JSF; and .NET using GoogleMapAPI, MapSuiteAPI, ASP.NET, .NET MVC
  • Develop big projects, including: EyeSeas (Ship Vessel Monitoring System), Telecommunication Rating Engine (Postpaid and Prepaid rating system for Vinaphone, Mobifone, it is very high load in peak-time: 1100 TPS), Configure Business Workflow, Billing Conversion, PhoneNumber Crawler System, Livescreen (Viettel, Mobifone), MCA (Vinaphone, Mobifone)
  • Deploy, maintain applications on IBM AIX, FreeBSD, Solaris, Linux, Windows Server
  • Build system analysis & design documents, as well as other project documents
  • Join training courses: Technical Skills, Project management, Task management, Document development, Teamwork

Result:

  • Became a key member was responsible for 5 high-load systems for military and telecommunication organizations
  • Worked as a DevOps, as well as an Oracle DBA in 2 projects and I was in-charged of many tasks with Database, Network, Hardware, and OS, which improved the system thinking and troubleshooting skills
  • Achieve certifications include Comverse One (Billing and customer care management system), IBM InfoSphere BigInsights BigData (P2090-032 & P2090-038), Oracle Database Administration (Commit), VMware Virtualization & Cloud (Robusta)

Developer at MISA Joint Stock Company – Financial, Accounting Software Development, April 2009 – May 2010

Build MISA financial software products

  • Analyze and design database structure with SQL Server
  • Develop services using Silverlight.Net Framework (WCF RIA Service), XAML (Expression Suite), VB.NET, Telerik Suite
  • Develop web application using: .NET MVC, LinQ, Entity Framework, jQuery, CSS
  • Participate in financial business courses
  • Research new technologies, including: ORACLE Database, Cloud Computing using Windows Azure framework

Result:

  • Build the projects, including: HRM.NET 2010, AMIS ERP, SME.NET 2008 (A popular Accounting Software in Vietnam; 15th phase: Develop new features and fix bugs)
  • Improve the work planning and organizing skills
  • Improve working experience in the professional environment

Trainee at Financial Software Solutions Company (FSSC) & North Asia Commercial Joint-Stock Bank (NASBank), November 2008 – April 2009

Work as a team member for the project “Develop FOREX Trading system at NASBANK”. This is also my university thesis.

  • Investigate and build wiki about Credit activities and Foreign Exchange Trading activities which use for analysis, design steps in my thesis
  • Work with DB2 and build reports using IBM Cognos ReportNet
  • Investigate the source code projects, including: Flexcube, I-Flex Solutions

Trainee at Online Instructional Technology Center (A unit of my university), June 2007 – August 2008

Develop and maintain E-Learning systems

  • Develop Web application using ASP.NET, JavaScript, CSS, Photoshop
  • Develop WinForm application using Java2SE
  • Study new web technologies such as ASP.NET MVC, Siverlight, JSF, WordPress
  • Maintain the SQL Server database and develop query reports
  • Setup, configure and troubleshoot issues related to Server and LAN system

Community

I gained outstanding achievements in the university studying process as

  • Scholarship of “Ministry of science and art of the State of Hessen”, Germany
  • Member of team: Nationwide Olympiad in Informatics
  • Member of team: Information Security

I gained certifications include

  • Comverse One (Billing and customer care management system)
  • IBM InfoSphere BigInsights BigData (P2090-032 & P2090-038)
  • Oracle Database Administration (Commit)
  • VMware Virtualization & Cloud (Robusta)

Education

Masters in University of Engineering and Technology, Vietnam National University

Bachelors in Faculty of Information Technology, Hanoi University

  • Merit Award for Excellence Student in 2009

High School / A Levels

Related Projects

  • NetLoading Tim hang nhanh iOS Android: Mobile application for truck drivers and truck owners.
  • NetLoading Admin: A React Single Page Application for administrator.
  • NetLoading B2B Workhub: A Django Web Applicaiton for B2B Market.
  • WIMO: A Angular application for B2B market where production and consumption units use WIMO logistic services.
  • DASAN Networks RMA: A Liferay portal with many Spring portlets for DASAN order management in Vietnam.
  • Synergix Taskhub: ERP Solution suite for the industry
  • Missed Call Alert - MCA Mobifone Vinaphone: A Java core system was built for the Telecommunication VAS service.
  • Other projects are internal purposes only which support for my company’s business so I don’t show here even though they took up a lot of working time.
